item.title: Background info
item.description: I’m an experienced Agile practitioner. I can code. And I use the design thinking process to deliver content that solves user problems.

item.title: Results
item.description: My work boosts user satisfaction and retention. It lowers support volume and reduces time-to-resolution of support tickets.
